channel.title: Axoloti Soundfont Player
channel.description:
Hey there! I have been thinking, wouldn't it be great if we had a Soundfont player object? It would be BAM instant rompler and then I guess there would still be a lot of DSP power to mangle and stack sounds. I am not a programmer, but it should not be too different from a sampler object i guess...
Cheers!

item.title: Axoloti Soundfont Player
item.dc:creator: @exmachina
item.description:
@exmachina wrote:

@toneburst

That's possible some soundfonts are quite big. Probably loading the soundfonts needs to be done sound by sound, not the soundfont in its entirety. But here am I talking as if I knew how to do such things

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti Soundfont Player
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

This would be cool. I think you'd quickly run up against Axoloti's RAM limitations, though.

a|x

Read full topic

item.title: Axoloti Soundfont Player
item.dc:creator: @urklang Nicolas Steven Miller
item.description:
@urklang wrote:

This would be really cool. I'd love to see more work around chiptune emulation too like this: http://community.axoloti.com/t/nes-apu-style-synth-voices/1775

Or possibly something like these old Adlib-style FM sounds: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_5HCwY8odxc

Read full topic
